    • Method Detail

      • fromTxt

        public static Maze fromTxt​(java.lang.String path)
                    throws InvalidMazeException,
                           java.io.IOException
        Loads a new Maze from the given file. Uses a java.io.BufferedReader with java.io.FileReader to read the file and constructs the maze top to bottom, left to right: line becomes row, character becomes tile.
        Parameters:
        path - : the path to the relevant file
        Returns:
        Returns the new Maze object
        Throws:
        InvalidMazeException - Specifies wrong input format, e.g. multiple exits or wrong characters
        java.io.IOException - If the file is unreadable
        See Also:
        InvalidMazeException, Tile

      • getAdjacentTile

        public Tile getAdjacentTile​(Tile t,
                            Maze.Direction d)
        Finds the nearest tile to the given one in the direction specified
        Parameters:
        t - : the initial tile
        d - : the direction in which to look
        Returns:
        The location of the closest tile in direction d
        See Also:
        Tile, Maze.Direction, Maze.Coordinate

      • getEntrance

        public Tile getEntrance()
        Getter for the entrance tile of the maze

      • getExit

        public Tile getExit()
        Getter for the exit tile of the maze

      • getTileAtLocation

        public Tile getTileAtLocation​(Maze.Coordinate c)
        Getter for a tile at specified coordinates
        Parameters:
        c - : the relevant pair of coordinates
        Returns:
        The tile at location (c.x, x.y), or a wall if the coordinate is out of bounds
        See Also:
        Maze.Coordinate, Tile

      • getTileLocation

        public Maze.Coordinate getTileLocation​(Tile t)
        Getter for the coordinates of a given tile
        Parameters:
        t - : the tile for which to find coordinates
        Returns:
        A Coordinate object with the relevant position or null if the tile is not in the maze
        See Also:
        Maze.Coordinate, Tile

      • getTiles

        public java.util.List<java.util.List<Tile>> getTiles()
        Getter for the tile matrix
        See Also:

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Method for parsing the maze to string for printing
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:

        See Also:
